glsa.title: xine-lib: Buffer overflow
glsa.synopsis: xine-lib is vulnerable to a buffer overflow in the Real Media input plugin, which could lead to the execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: xine is a portable and reusable multimedia playback engine. xine-lib is xine's core engine.

description.p: A possible buffer overflow has been reported in the Real Media input plugin.

impact.p: An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by enticing a user into loading a specially crafted stream with xine or an application using xine-lib. This can lead to a Denial of Service and possibly the execution of arbitrary code with the rights of the user running the application.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
